fields.name: Classic Tomato Bruschetta
fields.description: Grilled bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.

fields.name: Creamy Parmesan Pasta
fields.description: Tagliatelle tossed in a creamy parmesan sauce, finished with cracked black pepper.

fields.name: Grilled Lemon Salmon
fields.description: Fresh salmon grilled to perfection with herbs, served with vegetables.

fields.description: Traditional pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

fields.name: Warm Chocolate Brownie
fields.description: Chocolate brownie served warm with vanilla ice cream.

fields.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
fields.description: Classic cheesecake topped with fresh strawberries.

fields.name: Chilled Freshly Squeezed Orange Juice
fields.description: Cold pressed orange juice served fresh.
